name: Rise of the Triad

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game/Binaries/ROTTLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/game/Binaries
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES '/DIR=C:/game'
    description: Installing...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
